long_description: This 8 oz. container of preventative tire sealant protects against tread-area punctures in tubeless and tube-type tires. When punctures occur, Slime already in the tire creates a permanent flexible plug which lasts up to 2 years. Can also be used to repair flat tires after the fact. Sealant is non-toxic, non-flammable and biodegradable. 8-ounce bottle.
short_description: This 8 oz. container of preventative tire sealant protects against tread-area punctures in tubeless and tube-type tires.
